snippet: Biotech and technology shares again led the Nasdaq lower, and JPMorgan’s disappointing earnings hit many bank stocks.
abstract: Stocks slide in volatile session, pushing Nasdaq below 4,000 mark as sell-off continues to accelerate.
lead_paragraph: Biotech and technology shares again led the Nasdaq lower, and JPMorgan’s disappointing earnings hit many bank stocks.

headline.main: Nasdaq Falls Below 4,000 as Wall Street Sell-Off Continues
headline.print_headline: Nasdaq Falls Below 4,000 as Wall Street Sell-Off Continues
